name: The Beautiful Game, compressed
description: Euro 2020 Final (England vs Italy) compressed to fit the maximum file size allowed on Hic of 40MB. An exploration of what is left of the game if it’s dictated by the distribution limits. Inspired by the 00's 700MB CDs with 3-4 films squeezed into each and sold on local flee markets // Video art experiment, 64x36px H.264, 25fps, mono
